poem:
### Reflections on a Space Opera

In '77, a flicker of rebellion  
danced between stars and screens,  
blinding the eye with possibilities—  
before the eye could blind us all,  
when space was just space  
and stories could spark tears  
in a director's eye,  
the force of something  
more vast than watching.
